list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Fix calendar loading issues and Flutter compilation errors
Backend fixes: - Fix calendar API endpoint URLs (remove duplicate /calendar/ path) - Pass user_id correctly to calendar generation engine - Fix budget_mode_shell_integration to include user_id in config
Frontend fixes: - Move IncomeTier enum outside IncomeService class (Dart requirement) - Update all references from IncomeService.IncomeTier to IncomeTier - Fix CardTheme to CardThemeData for Flutter compatibility - Update calendar API endpoint URLs to match backend routes
ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

Code Quality: Replaced 79+ print statements with structured logging system across Flutter and backend 4. Performance Upgrade: Upgraded SQLAlchemy to 2.x with modern async patterns and connection pooling 5. ï¸ Repository Pattern: Implemented comprehensive data access layer with Base, User, Transaction, Expense, and Goal repositories 6. Test Coverage: Added 4,700+ lines of comprehensive tests covering repositories, circuit breakers, and resilient services

With these fixes, you should now see:
